title: Revlon PhotoReady Insta-Sculpt Contouring Palette, 0.5 Ounce
features: Easy to blend, silky smooth powder format
Effortlessly create multiple on trend looks
One universal palette that flatters all skin types
description: Revlon Photo ready Insta-Sculpt, Contouring Palette makes contouring simple! An easy-to-use palette to instantly sculpt and define features for a flawless, transformed look! Expertly emphasize your best features with our fool-proof four-step kit: three contouring shades (light, medium, deep) and a blush shade for a pop of color help you achieve an enhanced, perfectly sculpted look. Blendable, lightweight powder format with silky smooth texture that allows you to build coverage and customize your look. High-Definition Filter Technology captures and transforms any light, to blur and soften flaws, leaving the perfect app filtered look. Starting with one product and expanding to a prestigious cosmetic industry, Revlon has been providing customers with products that make women look and feel glamorous. Revlon is the No.1 long wear brand at the forefront of trends and fashion across the globe.
